name: 書報討論（二）
restrict: 允許重複修 ◎課程開放上修
description: 1.To train stusents with the skills in presentation. 2.To help students understand the methodology and presentation presented by the authors in the most rently reserach papers. 3.To train students how to evaluate and appreciate the research papers. 4. To train students to do the effective oral presentation in the public.
goals: To train students with the skills in presentation.
To help students understand the methodology and presentation presented by the authors in the most rently reserach papers
To train students how to evaluate and appreciate the research papers.
To train students to do the effective oral presentation in the public.
syllabus:
1.  近年(2018-2020)無機化學相關文獻回顧；範圍為 JACS or Angew Chem or Chem Sci.
2.  每位同學以口頭報告形式，進行文獻回顧報告。
